subject: FW: Flock deployment map
body:
Jake Burke
Captain � Investigations Division
Eugene Police Department
300 Country Club Road
Eugene, Oregon 97401
(541) 682-5895 work
 
 

 
From: JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov> 
Sent: Thursday, March 6, 2025 7:21 AM
To: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov>
Subject: RE: Flock deployment map
 
Have a call out to my Region 2 contact and will let you know what I hear.
 
Bret Jones
Traffic Operations
City of Eugene
O:541-682-4908
C:541-228-5722
 
From: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov > 
Sent: Thursday, March 06, 2025 7:17 AM
To: JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov >
Subject: RE: Flock deployment map
 
Good morning, thank you Bret.  Also, if they don�t want it on their equipment, Flock can put it on their own pole  but would be on ODOT property. 
 
 
Jake Burke
Captain � Investigations Division
Eugene Police Department
300 Country Club Road
Eugene, Oregon 97401
(541) 682-5895 work
 
 

 
From: JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov > 
Sent: Thursday, March 6, 2025 6:11 AM
To: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >
Subject: RE: Flock deployment map
 
Morning Jake,
 
All the signals in question #1 are ours. I will check in with ODOT to see how they feel about deploying them on the signals they own. 
 
Bret Jones
Traffic Operations
City of Eugene
O:541-682-4908
C:541-228-5722
 
From: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov > 
Sent: Thursday, March 06, 2025 4:46 AM
To: JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov >
Subject: Re: Flock deployment map
 
Thank you Bret.  If we maintain all those under question 1, are they owned by ODOT?  
 
Do you have a point of contact with ODOT that you can provide?  Trying to figure out if those intersections are off limits or not. 
 
 
 
Jake Burke
Captain � Investigations Division
Eugene Police Department
300 Country Club Road
Eugene, Oregon 97401
(541) 682-5895 work
 
 
 

 
________________________________

From: JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov >
Sent: Thursday, March 6, 2025 4:39:47 AM
To: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >
Subject: Re: Flock deployment map 
 
Jake,
 
We maintain all of the intersections listed under your first question. 
 
We own and maintain River and Willow Springs.The other intersections for question 2 are owned by ODOT and maintained by us. However ramps at those intersections are maintained by ODOT.
 
Thanks,
Bret
 
Get Outlook for iOS https://aka.ms/o0ukef
